title: Congressional candidate Ilario Pantano is scheduled to speak at the Myrtle Grove Presbyterian Church on August 14.  Does that raise a question about the church\'s tax-exempt status?  Or does the fact that the event is sponsored by the church\'s Men\'s Ministry get around that issue?
text:
Unfortunately, your question is too broad and speculative to be
answered by MyReporter.com. It has been forwarded to a
StarNewsOnline.com editor for consideration.
